Ref: CXP093/2024

Criteria:

  • Bachelors or Honors Degree in Social Work
  • 3-5 years of clinical social work experience
  • Detailed understanding of applicable legal frameworks
  • Experience and knowledge in GBV and related matters
  • Computer Literate – MS Office, Google Workspace, Emails
  • Able to make psychosocial assessments and develop and implement care plans
  • Able to provide after-hours service as needed
  • Excellent written and verbal comms in English and Zulu. Afrikaans is advantageous
  • Valid Certificate of registration with SACSSP
  • SAPS Clearance certificate
  • Own vehicle and Code 8 License

Apply via website or alternatively, via: https://forms.gle/8mRbBqpY1WY7fSPs7
